title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 36-1.5 - Approved devices and materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 36-1.5 - Approved devices and materials

State Regulations

No provision of this Part shall limit the power of the
board to approve, disapprove or revoke approval of devices or materials. An
approved device or material of a class or designation required by this Part
shall constitute a device or material in compliance with this Part, any
provision of this or any other Part of the Industrial Code
notwithstanding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
36-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
